content:
A friend brought this advertisement to my attention:

https://nrc58.nas.edu/RAPLab10/Opportunity/Opportunity.aspx?LabCode=13&ROPCD=133010&RONum=C0399&ROBaseMode=R100

It's for a postdoc at the Air Force Research Laboratory, to work on formal methods for design and verification of autonomous systems. Unfortunately, it's only open to US citizens. But it would be a nice space for Lean to inhabit.

(I wonder, should we have a stream for job postings?)
